        public Collection<String> getProperties()
        Get the set of property names for this complex field. Properties are returned sorted according to the displayOrder defined in the index metadata, if any.

        public String getTokenLengthField()
        Returns the Lucene field that contains the length (in tokens) of this field, or null if there is no such field.
        Returns:
        the field name or null if lengths weren't stored

      • hasXmlTags

        public boolean hasXmlTags()

      • hasPunctuation

        public boolean hasPunctuation()
        Checks if this field has a "punctuation" forward index, storing all the intra-word characters (whitespace and punctuation) so we can build concordances directly from the forward indices.
        Returns:
        true iff there's a punctuation forward index.
